channel.title: Wisdoms on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Wisdoms on Dixit Patel

item.title: Quotes
item.description: I often come across inspirational content/quotes on youtube, blog posts, HackerNews, etc that I keep stockpiling into my Evernote. Below are tidbits from this diary of growing wisdom. Hope you like them! Bill Gates The best way to prepare as a programmer is to write programs, and to study great programs that other people have written. In my case, I went to the garbage cans at the Computer Science Center and I fished out listings of their operating system.
